n+t.toUpperCase()}).replace(/^-/,"")}function u(e){return e.replace(/([A-Z])/g,function(e,n){return"-"+n.toLowerCase()}).replace(/^ms-/,"-ms-")}function f(){return"function"!=typeof n.createElement?n.createElement(arguments[0]):b?n.createElementNS.call(n,"http://www.w3.org/2000/svg",arguments[0]):n.createElement.apply(n,arguments)}function l(){var e=n.body;return e||(e=f(b?"svg":"body"),e.fake=!0),e}function c(e,t,r,o){var i,s,a,u,c="modernizr",d=f("div"),p=l();if(parseInt(r,10))for(;r--;)a=f("div"),a.id=o?o[r]:c+(r+1),d.appendChild(a);return t}function v(e,n){return function(){return e.apply(n,arguments)}}function m(e,n,t){var o;for(var i in e)if(e[i]in n)return t===!1?e[i]:(o=n[e[i]],r(o,"function")?v(o,t||n):o);return!1}function h(e,n,o,i){function s(){l&&(delete O.style,delete O.modElem)}if(i=r(i,"undefined")?!1:i,!r(o,"undefined")){var u=p(e,o);if(!r(u,"undefined"))return u}for(var l,c,v,m,h,g=["modernizr","tspan","samp"];!O.style&&g.length;)l=!0,O.modElem=f(g.shift()),O.style=O.modElem.style;for(v=e.length,c=0;v>c;c++)if(m=e[c],h=O.style[m],d(m,"-")&&(m=a(m)),O.style[m]!==t){if(i||r(o,"undefined"))return s(),"pfx"==n?m:!0;try{O.style[m]=o}catch(y){}if(O.style[m]!=h)return s(),"pfx"==n?m:!0}return s(),!1}function g(e,n,t,o,i){var s=e.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+e.slice(1),a=(e+" "+j.join(s+" ")+s).split("           </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="What We're Watching" data-vars-position="4" href="/news/a35822035/watch-a-porsche-911-stomp-a-new-bmw-m4-competition-in-a-drag-race/">
            911 Stomps New BMW M4 Competition in Drag Race
           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-dek item-dek">
            <p>
             The BMW has a massive horsepower advantage over the 911 Carrera and a quicker claimed 0-60 time. It doesn't seem to matter.
            </p>
           </div>
           <span class="custom-item-meta">
            <!-- shared/byline -->
            <div class="byline custom-item-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
             By
             <span class="byline-name" itemprop="name" rel="author">
              Mack Hogan
             </span>
            </div>
            <!-- / shared/byline -->
            <div class="publish-date custom-item-publish-date js-date" data-format="MMM D, YYYY" data-publish-date="2021-03-12T18:19:00Z">
             Mar 12, 2021
            </div>
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="feed-block-container block-style- block-layout-image-left">

        <div class="custom-item were-not-as-quick-as-red-bull-says-mercedes-in-obvious-lie image-left">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="News" data-vars-position="8" href="/news/a35875094/were-not-as-quick-as-red-bull-says-mercedes-in-obvious-lie/">

         <div class="custom-item why-would-anyone-buy-truck-nuts column-stacked">
          <div class="custom-item-inner">
           <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="R&amp;T Exclusives" data-vars-position="4" href="/car-culture/a35810948/why-would-anyone-buy-truck-nuts/">
            <img alt="john vincent aranda illustration" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/03-yes-we-can-see-you-re-nuts-dept-of-overthinking-road-track-12-18-20-final-draft-jv-aranda-1615482353.jpg?crop=1.00xw:0.823xh;0,0.152xh&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/03-yes-we-can-see-you-re-nuts-dept-of-overthinking-road-track-12-18-20-final-draft-jv-aranda-1615482353.jpg?crop=1.00xw:0.823xh;0,0.152xh&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/03-yes-we-can-see-you-re-nuts-dept-of-overthinking-road-track-12-18-20-final-draft-jv-aranda-1615482353.jpg?crop=1.00xw:0.823xh;0,0.152xh&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/03-yes-we-can-see-you-re-nuts-dept-of-overthinking-road-track-12-18-20-final-draft-jv-aranda-1615482353.jpg?crop=1.00xw:0.823xh;0,0.152xh&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/03-yes-we-can-see-you-re-nuts-dept-of-overthinking-road-track-12-18-20-final-draft-jv-aranda-1615482353.jpg?crop=1.00xw:0.823xh;0,0.152xh&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title=""/>
           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-content">
            <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="R&amp;T Exclusives" data-vars-position="4" href="/car-culture/a35810948/why-would-anyone-buy-truck-nuts/">
             Why Would Anyone Buy Truck Nuts?
            </a>
            <div class="custom-item-dek item-dek">
             <p>
              What to make of bumper-mounted buffoonery?
             </p>
            </div>
            <span class="custom-item-meta">
             <!-- shared/byline -->
             <div class="byline custom-item-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
              By
              <span class="byline-name" itemprop="name" rel="author">
               Pro. Edward Alterman
              </span>
             </div>
             <!-- / shared/byline -->
            </span>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="custom-item the-stealthy-art-of-ultra-custom-car-sound-systems column-stacked">
          <div class="custom-item-inner">
           <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="R&amp;T Exclusives" data-vars-position="5" href="/car-culture/a35811452/the-stealthy-art-of-ultra-custom-car-sound-systems/">
            <img alt="aston martin lagonda" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/22802-1-1615487291.jpg?crop=0.752xw:1.00xh;0.0657xw,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/22802-1-1615487291.jpg?crop=0.752xw:1.00xh;0.0657xw,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/22802-1-1615487291.jpg?crop=0.752xw:1.00xh;0.0657xw,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/22802-1-1615487291.jpg?crop=0.752xw:1.00xh;0.0657xw,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/22802-1-1615487291.jpg?crop=0.752xw:1.00xh;0.0657xw,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title=""/>
           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-content">
            <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="R&amp;T Exclusives" data-vars-position="5" href="/car-culture/a35811452/the-stealthy-art-of-ultra-custom-car-sound-systems/">
             The Stealthy Art of High-End Car Sound Systems
            </a>
            <div class="custom-item-dek item-dek">
             <p>
              How do you make the garbage stereo in your Lagonda sound like Carnegie Hall? Let AI Design explain.
             </p>

      <div class="feed-block-inner">
       <div class="feed-block-header">
        <h2 class="feed-block-heading">
         <a href="/car-culture/car-accessories/">
          Gear
         </a>
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="featured-item" data-vars-block-curation="Subsection" data-vars-block-id="190bfbe6-ce9d-4bc5-89eb-735cfaf7ab35" data-vars-block-slot="7" data-vars-block-type="Big Story Feed Block">
        <div class="custom-item pro-av-equipment-for-shooting-car-videos column-right">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">

            Murray Walker, the Voice of Formula 1, Has Died
           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-dek item-dek">
            <p>
             England's voice of Formula 1 was 97.
            </p>

        <div class="custom-item kyle-larson-wins-at-las-vegas image-stacked">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Racing" data-vars-position="3" href="/news/a35757263/kyle-larson-wins-at-las-vegas/">
           <span class="lqip lazyload" data-expand="2000" data-lqip="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/kyle-larson-driver-of-the-hendrickcars-com-chevrolet-news-photo-1615163173.?crop=0.670xw:1.00xh;0.204xw,0&amp;resize=480:*&amp;frame=1&amp;lqip=yes">
           </span>
           <img alt="nascar cup series pennzoil 400 presented by jiffy lube" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/kyle-larson-driver-of-the-hendrickcars-com-chevrolet-news-photo-1615163173.?crop=0.670xw:1.00xh;0.204xw,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/kyle-larson-driver-of-the-hendrickcars-com-chevrolet-news-photo-1615163173.?crop=0.670xw:1.00xh;0.204xw,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/kyle-larson-driver-of-the-hendrickcars-com-chevrolet-news-photo-1615163173.?crop=0.670xw:1.00xh;0.204xw,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/kyle-larson-driver-of-the-hendrickcars-com-chevrolet-news-photo-1615163173.?crop=0.670xw:1.00xh;0.204xw,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/kyle-larson-driver-of-the-hendrickcars-com-chevrolet-news-photo-1615163173.?crop=0.670xw:1.00xh;0.204xw,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title="NASCAR Cup Series Pennzoil 400 presented by Jiffy Lube"/>
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Racing" data-vars-position="3" href="/news/a35757263/kyle-larson-wins-at-las-vegas/">
            Kyle Larson Wins at Las Vegas
           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-dek item-dek">
            Eleven months ago, Larson was fired from Chip Ganassi Racing for using a racial slur during an iRacing event. Today, he is a winner for…
           </div>
           <span class="custom-item-meta">
            <!-- shared/byline -->
            <div class="byline custom-item-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
             By
             <span class="byline-name" itemprop="name" rel="author">
              Fred Smith
             </span>
            </div>
            <!-- / shared/byline -->
            <div class="publish-date custom-item-publish-date js-date" data-format="MMM D, YYYY" data-publish-date="2021-03-08T00:27:00Z">
             Mar 8, 2021
            </div>
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="custom-item this-is-aston-martins-new-formula-1-safety-car image-stacked">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Racing" data-vars-position="4" href="/news/a35740621/this-is-aston-martins-new-formula-1-safety-car/">
           <img alt="aston martin's new safety car for formula 1" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/aston-martin-vantage-official-safety-car-of-formula-one-19-1614958154.jpg?crop=0.672xw:1.00xh;0.263xw,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/aston-martin-vantage-official-safety-car-of-formula-one-19-1614958154.jpg?crop=0.672xw:1.00xh;0.263xw,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/aston-martin-vantage-official-safety-car-of-formula-one-19-1614958154.jpg?crop=0.672xw:1.00xh;0.263xw,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/aston-martin-vantage-official-safety-car-of-formula-one-19-1614958154.jpg?crop=0.672xw:1.00xh;0.263xw,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/aston-martin-vantage-official-safety-car-of-formula-one-19-1614958154.jpg?crop=0.672xw:1.00xh;0.263xw,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title=""/>

          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Racing" data-vars-position="4" href="/news/a35740621/this-is-aston-martins-new-formula-1-safety-car/">
            This Is Aston Martin's New Formula 1 Safety Car
           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-dek item-dek">
            <p>
             Aston Martin will join Mercedes in providing safety and medical cars for Formula 1.
            </p>
           </div>

        <div class="custom-item the-irish-american-sports-car-that-should-have-beaten-the-world column-right">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">

          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Car Culture" data-vars-position="1" href="/car-culture/a35863729/the-irish-american-sports-car-that-should-have-beaten-the-world/">
            The Irish-American Sports Car That Should Have Beaten the World
           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-dek item-dek">
            Engineered in Ireland and styled in California, the Devin SS perfected the Shelby Cobra recipe half a decade before the first Cobra was…
           </div>
           <span class="custom-item-meta">
            <!-- shared/byline -->
            <div class="byline custom-item-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">

            </a>

         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Road &amp; Track Buyer's Guides" data-vars-position="1" href="/car-culture/a35713710/nissan-gt-r-buyers-guide-every-generation/">

          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Road &amp; Track Buyer's Guides" data-vars-position="1" href="/car-culture/a35713710/nissan-gt-r-buyers-guide-every-generation/">
            Nissan GT-R: Guide to Every Generation
           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-dek item-dek">
            <p>
             From the late Sixties legend up to today's modern supercar, here's what you need to know before buying a GT-R.
            </p>
           </div>
           <span class="custom-item-meta">
            <!-- shared/byline -->
            <div class="byline custom-item-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">

        <div class="custom-item porsche-911-buyers-guide-every-generation image-stacked">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Road &amp; Track Buyer's Guides" data-vars-position="2" href="/car-culture/a35192779/porsche-911-buyers-guide-every-generation/">
           <img alt="porsche 911 generations" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/b-beh-1789-1610474968.jpg?crop=0.569xw:1.00xh;0.269xw,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/b-beh-1789-1610474968.jpg?crop=0.569xw:1.00xh;0.269xw,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/b-beh-1789-1610474968.jpg?crop=0.569xw:1.00xh;0.269xw,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/b-beh-1789-1610474968.jpg?crop=0.569xw:1.00xh;0.269xw,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/b-beh-1789-1610474968.jpg?crop=0.569xw:1.00xh;0.269xw,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title=""/>
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Road &amp; Track Buyer's Guides" data-vars-position="2" href="/car-culture/a35192779/porsche-911-buyers-guide-every-generation/">
            Porsche 911 Buyer Guide: Each Generation Explained
           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-dek item-dek">
            For more than 50 years, the 911 has been a sports car benchmark. Here's what you need to know before buying any generation of Porsche's…
           </div>
           <span class="custom-item-meta">
            <!-- shared/byline -->
            <div class="byline custom-item-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
             By
             <span class="byline-name" itemprop="name" rel="author">
              Chris Perkins
             </span>
            </div>
            <!-- / shared/byline -->
            <div class="publish-date custom-item-publish-date js-date" data-format="MMM D, YYYY" data-publish-date="2021-01-13T18:03:00Z">
             Jan 13, 2021
            </div>
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="custom-item toyota-supra-buyers-guide image-stacked">

	d.addEventListener( "DOMContentLoaded", function() {
		var l, h = d.getElementsByTagName( "head" )[ 0 ],
		f = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/roadtrack/assets/css/homepage.6446e30.css"],

		for ( var i = 0, len = f.length; i < len; i++ ) {
			l = d.createElement( "link" );
			l.rel = "stylesheet";
			l.href = Modernizr && Modernizr.mobile ? m[ i ] : f[ i ];

			h.parentNode.insertBefore( l, h );
		}
	} );
} )( document, Modernizr );
